description:
* Based loosely on the book written by http://anidb.net/cr1463 [Alexandre Dumas] titled Comte de Monte-Cristo (The Count of Monte Cristo), this story is set in a far future time against an intergalactic backdrop.
http://anidb.net/ch954 [Albert] was a boy who had been born to a noble family in Paris. He made a journey to the moon with http://anidb.net/ch963 [Franz] to escape from their tedious lives. On the moon, he met a millionaire calling himself http://anidb.net/ch958 [the Count of Monte Cristo].
The Count lived a life of splendour in a rich hotel, with beautiful women waiting on him and strong men guarding him. Albert was fascinated by this Count who seemed to know everything, and the two became friends. Albert eventually invited the Count to visit him in Paris.
The Count`s past slowly resurfaces, to the greatest displeasure of everybody involved.

REGULAR.description:
Young aristocrat Albert visits the city of Luna on the surface of the moon. He quickly falls under the spell of an enigmatic gentleman - the Count of Monte Cristo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nous nous rencontrons à la fin du voyage
Tabi no Owari ni Bokura wa Deau
旅の終わりに僕らは出会う

REGULAR.description:
Albert is kidnapped! Franz`s frantic attempt to collect the ransom money comes up short, so he warily seeks the assistance of the Count of Monte Cristo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jusqu`à ce que le soleil se lève sur la Lune
Prima che sorga il sole sulla luna
Tsuki ni Asahi ga Noboru made
Until the Sun Rises over the Moon

REGULAR.description:
Back in Paris, Albert`s sheltered friends grow suspicious upon the arrival of the mysterious Count of Monte Cristo.
Source: crunchyroll

The questions surrounding the Count multiply when Albert visits the man`s lavish mansion in Champs Elysees, which is filled with complicated tricks and gold ornaments.
Source: crunchyroll

During a pleasure cruise arranged by the Count, a disagreement leads to a duel between Albert and Maximilien. Albert`s raw emotions allow his host to grasp even more sway over his destiny.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anata wa Kon`yakusha o Aishitemasu ka
あなたは婚約者を愛してますか

REGULAR.description:
The Count of Monte Cristo positions himself deeper into the lives of those around Albert after meeting a banker and his frustrated wife.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanojo no Yuuutsu, Boku no Yuuutsu
彼女の憂鬱, 僕の憂鬱

REGULAR.description:
The lives of Albert`s aristocratic friends are full of secrets - and the Count is among those prone to whispering in the ears of ladies known to be spoken for.
Source: crunchyroll

At a party thrown by the Count, the guests play a game. They search for a secret room in the villa where a curse is sealed away. Albert has already discovered one secret kept between the Count and Heloise.
Source: crunchyroll

The charms of the Count are fading for some, as mysteries and suspicions multiply. The controversy surrounding the mysterious man can only grow when a hidden poisoner begins to ply their trade.
Source: crunchyroll

Villefort, Danglars, and Morcerf are invited to a funeral. Albert suspects something is wrong and follows them to an old church, where the lid of the casket is about to be opened.
Source: crunchyroll

Three aristocratic households are growing aware that they are caught in a conspiracy. Franz immediately suspects the Count, but Albert won`t hear of it.
Source: crunchyroll

Albert`s engagement is in jeopardy; Baron Dangler prefers his daughter to marry into wealth. Albert rushes to the opera house to find Eugenie - but the curtain may have already closed on his love.
Source: crunchyroll

Attorney General Villefort demands the arrest of the Count of Monte Cristo, but Heloise takes steps to prevent it from happening.
Source: crunchyroll

After the announcement of Eugenie and Andrea`s engagement leaves Albert feeling betrayed, the Count appears and invites him on a journey deep into the universe.
Source: crunchyroll

Aboard his spaceship, the Count of Monte Cristo tells Albert about an old friend who was betrayed and imprisoned. Back home, Franz is close to learning an important secret.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fin du bonheur, début de la vérité
Shiawase no Owari, Shinjitsu no Hajimari
The End of Happiness, the Beginning of Truth
幸せの終わり, 真実の始まり

REGULAR.description:
Closing in on the secret of the Gankutsuou, Franz learns of a sailor named Edmond Dantes who had strange connections to many of the families in Parisian high society.
Source: crunchyroll

After the Count reveals a shocking truth, Albert is left shattered when Franz explains a horrible and twisted story of revenge.
Source: crunchyroll

Mercedes enters the misty woods to meet the Count - but only a scene of violence is waiting for her.
Source: crunchyroll

The Count escalates his plan for revenge, launching a bitter blow at his next target, the Danglars Bank. The impact will be felt by many - including Albert.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even If I Should Stop Being Me
Même si je n`étais plus moi-même
Tatoe, Boku ga Boku de Nakunatta Toshitemo
たとえ, 僕が僕でなくなったとしても

REGULAR.description:
Being rescued from danger by Chateau-Renaud, Albert learns about Eugenie`s marriage and rushes over to the Danglars` home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよなら, ユージェニー

REGULAR.description:
An abominable memory, consigned to the darkness of the past, has been resurrected by the hands of the Count and his plan of revenge enters its final stage.
Source: crunchyroll

The final target of the Count`s rage returns to Earth and the bombardment of Paris begins!
Source: crunchyroll

Albert and Mercedes are seriously wounded as Fernand prepares for his final showdown with the Count of Monte Cristo.
Source: crunchyroll

Five years later, Albert returns to Paris to visit the relics of his former life and the grave of a dear friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Museum: 美術背景設定資料
Museum: メカニック関連設定資料
Fukuyama Jun, Hirakawa Daisuke, Nakamura Chie, Nakahara Mai: Zadan Kai

福山潤・中田譲治 対談 Newtype企画

前田真宏監督インタビュー 「最終幕に向けて」
DVD発売告知キャストコメント
Tokyo Anime Fair 2005 Anime Award Ceremony and Staff Comment
Tokyo Kokusai Anime Fair 2005, Tokyo Anime Award, Jushoushiki no Moyou & Staff Jushou Comment
東京国際アニメフェア2005 東京アニメアワード 授賞式の模様 & スタッフ受賞コメント
Gankutsuou: The Count of Monte Cristo
The Count of Monte Cristo: Gankutsuou
